ygData.msgSnippet: Airbomber smils. So, where are we going? Train Wreck asks, his eyes crossing. He hit himself in the head and his optics straightened out. We go to join

Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Airbomber smils.

"So, where are we going?" Train Wreck asks, his eyes cros=
sing. He hit himself in the head and his optics straightened out.

"We go t=
o join another group, be it Newcomers, Predacons with Hell Beast, Predacons=
 with Megatron, are Alliance." Stranato said.

"Yeah, but we don't know whe=
re Megatron's team are!" Blender put in. Stronghold stared ahead, thinking =
about which team would be best to join.

"Anyone for a cookie?" Arrow asked=
.

"You made those?" Stronghold asked.

"Yes, I did!" Arrow said.

"What a =
wuss, ah yes, what are they made of? Ah screw it just give me one, as long =
as you'll shut up!" Stronghold said, he grabbed one and Arrow chuckled with=
 delight. Blender sighed and shook his head. Airbomber laughed but then Arr=
ow turned around in his walk and looked at him. Airbomber sighed and took a=
 cookie. He did a fake chuckle. Arrow looked at Infectra and smiled...
  --=
--- Original Message ----- 
  From: ilovealllizards 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.c=
om 
  Sent: Friday, July 14, 2000 10:06 PM
  Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


=
  Infectra: Sure, I'll come with you. *Infectra says to The Radicons as she=
 continues to follow them*
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: THEC=
ODE 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Friday, July 14, 2000 9:25 PM
  =
  Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


    Airbomber looks back at Infectra and sm=
iles.

    "We're leaving the Maximals, they are full of themselves are stu=
pid, we don't want to be with the likes of them, won't you come with us, In=
fectra?" Airbomber pleaded.

    "If you don't then I pity you, of course."=
 Stranato said...
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: ilovealll=
izards 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Friday, July 14, 2000 7:4=
8 PM
      Subject: Neo Beast Wars


      *Infectra looks around as she fo=
llows The Radicons hoping that they would find some excitment*

-----------=
-------------------------------------------------------------------
